de.samdev.absgdx.framework.menu.events

Interface MenuBaseElementListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MenuButtonListener, MenuCheckboxListener, MenuContainerListener, MenuEditListener, MenuFrameListener, MenuImageListener, MenuLabelListener, MenuPanelListener, MenuRadioButtonListener, MenuSettingsTreeListener

    public interface MenuBaseElementListener
    An event listener for a MenuBaseElement

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClicked(MenuBaseElement element, java.lang.String identifier)
      Called when this component is clicked (down + release)

      Called when the component gains the focus
      void onFocusLost(MenuBaseElement element, java.lang.String identifier)
      Called when the the component looses the focus
      void onHover(MenuBaseElement element, java.lang.String identifier)
      Called when the pointer enters this component
      void onHoverEnd(MenuBaseElement element, java.lang.String identifier)
      Called when the pointer leaves this component

      Called when this component is clicked (down)
      void onPointerUp(MenuBaseElement element, java.lang.String identifier)
      Called when this component is clicked (released)
